attributes.title: To many adds😡
attributes.review: I downloaded this app expecting to see the amazing things our lord and savior Donald trump is doing😌 but instead I was bombarded with a ridiculous amount of adds😡 all I asked was to support my president but instead all I see are adds of these cute anime girls🥵 I find this app to be highly unprofessional and honestly disrespectful🤦🏻‍♀️

attributes.title: absolutely horrible
attributes.review: I’ve never seen an app cause such chaos. It rendered my phone to be completely unusable. I am traumatized by the orange figure that is displayed immediately on the apps home screen as i every time i see this figure i become nauseous and shake. This app brings horrible luck and absolutely no one should download it!

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: It was so so awful! When I downloaded it it didn’t just pop up with a ugly Cheeto also it SIGNED ME OFF of ALL social media. I didn’t know most of my passwords so I had to make a new account after THOUSANDS of followers lost. Also it imitiatly asked me to donate to THE CHEETO!! Like no what does a Cheeto need money for? Not to get eaten? Honestly I would eat u u pay me or not!

attributes.title: horrible, do better.
attributes.review: so i wrote a review before and about a week later i got a package at my house. trump is there with the fbi and my package. my grandma appears and opens the package and it is a box filled with rats. the rats proceeded to drop-kick my grandma, and one i thought it was done every single fbi agent decided to spit in my grandma’s mouth. now at first thought they were being kind because they were adding extra lubrication to my grandmother’s body. oh boy was i wrong. my grandmother is now at one of the top hospitals in the world, fighting for her life against the same rat the drop-kicked her.

attributes.title: bad!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to learn more about the racist president, and let me say; I was not impressed. The app itself is unorganized and trashy and took two days to download! I knew that was a red flag. Anyway it was not helpful in any way to me and I don’t recommend downloading. Also the amount of false information being spread on it is appalling!

attributes.title: White supremacist
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what information it would give me but it had nothing but disgusting biased, fake news, white supremacy, homophobic, racist, theocracy, misogynistic news and views I couldn’t support. Kids know way more about politics now than disgusting grownups who support an orange man in office and literally form a cult about him. Absolutely disgusting.

attributes.title: Cursed
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to try and support my all time favorite rapist and white supremacist, but the app crashed and now I am cursed. First aliens came down on my house and raped my husband and dogs. This is no coincidence, it was the app’s fault. Then my son died from polio. The doctor said it was because he had no vaccinations but so truly believe it was this wretched app’s fault.

attributes.title: Caused dementia🍊
attributes.review: My grandma was a trump supporter since the first election he ran. My grandma downloaded this app hoping for more reasons to support her president but when she downloaded the app it made her phone explode. The shards of glass went in her nose and mouth and everything got into her system. Ever since then she doesn’t remember her own name. TRUMP CAUSED MY GRANDMOTHER TO HAVE DEMENTIA!!!!!! She’s on life support right now.😡

attributes.title: Horrible don’t download it
attributes.review: I was not able to get on it everytime I press the app it will go white and send me back to my home screen. You got to do better I only download it to learn more facts about him but wasn’t able to get on. This is completely trash you got to do better then that . 🥱👎🏾👎🏾👎🏾

attributes.title: HORRIBLE DO NOT GET
attributes.review:
this is unacceptable. This app is absolutely horrible. Do not get it. It gave  me a HUGE bug. And I mean HUGE. If you don’t want your phone to get a virus then don’t get it. I never wanted this app in the first place, it just downloaded randomly. Just don’t get it. And trump anyway it a dried orange peel. He is a piece of trash. He is a racist clown. Don’t get this app or vote for him. #SAVEBARRON2020
#TRUMPINCAGE2020
